page.title: 04LOCAL PROBLEMS TRANSPORT
page.content: The biggest local problem in Oulton Broad is the traffic and buses.Britains problems are unemployment,weapons and hooligans. World wide problems are famine and love for one other. Criminal offence in Oulton Broad are Break in's and Burglary in the house. Local customs are going to church,boating and fishing. Local delicacies are ice cream and sea foods. Ghosts that have been seen are the A12 Postman, ghosts on the Broads and a ghost in the Railway Station. Local news are traffic jams,the visiting of the Queen ,and the Scanner Appeal.
